page.title: 17Schools'trip to France.
page.content: I went on a trip to France which involved five different schools. Only three children went from our school and our teacher,Mrs. Farebrother.We travelled on June 13th 1985 and left Bothel School in a coach at 20.00 hours. There were thirty seven children on the coach and five teachers. We travelled down to Dover through the night and boarded the ferry to take us across the channel at about 6.00 hours. We were just about an hour and a half on the ferry,which was great as we could walk about and buy food and drinks.Near to Calais on the French coast,we went down to the deck where the coach was parked and got in our seats, ready to disembark. We had a long journey through France to Trouville,where we were staying. The coach driver put the video on and most of us fell asleep.
